json.text: Now in this first part, I'd like to ask you some more questions about yourself. OK?
OK.
What do you do when you have a holiday?
Well mostly when I have a holiday I use
it for sleeping and play sports with my friends.
Where do you like to spend your holidays?
Well I like to spend my holidays at home for most of the time because I like
sleeping till like 2 p.m., and afterwards I will play computer
games with like ... with my friends or play sports in the sports centre with my friends.
Can you describe a typical day in your holiday?
Well, the typical day would be ... me waking up at 1 p.m., then have lunch, eat at home and
then turn on the computer to see if the friends are online and play computer
games with them and then maybe about 4 to 5 p.m. in the afternoon I will go out
and play badminton with my friends, and at night, maybe just go home and help cook dinner, yeah.
Why are holidays important to you?
Well, holidays are important to me, especially those with a theme like the
Chinese Lunar New Year, which is kind of my main income from the 'red pockets', and
some are ... some other holidays like ... some other holidays give me a chance to take
a break from the exhausting schedule of university.
If you could take a holiday anywhere in the world where would you like to go?
Well, if I have a holiday, I would like to go to Taiwan, because the place is
beautiful and more importantly I can speak Mandarin and I can read their
languages, so it is easier for me and my friends to ... visit such
a place
so that we don't worry about ourselves and it is beautiful really, yeah.
Now, let's go on to places to go in your free time.
What do people in your town do in their free time?
Well, mostly the people in my town go to malls and do shopping in their free time
because they don't have that time when they're working and there are always
promotion sales in holidays so sometimes even I and my family go visit the malls
in holiday, yeah.
Where can they go for entertainment?
Well ... there are always cinema in the malls so that after or before the shopping
they could ... they could watch a movie first and then grab a bite in the mall and
then do shopping or buy dinner, and they may end the day with just being in mall, yeah.
What do you prefer? Eating in restaurants or eating at home.
Well for me I don't like cooking and my cooking is bad so that I prefer eating
outside rather than eating in home and it is not that expensive eating in a
restaurant in Hong Kong so I'd prefer eating outside, yeah.
